video.title: Enterprise
video.synopsis: Capt. Archer and his crew explore space and discover human innovation-expanding technologies as they meet new alien races in this "Star Trek" prequel.

episodes.synopsis: Enterprise is about to embark on a dangerous first mission: bringing a chased Klingon back to his home world.
episodes.title: Broken Bow: Part 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Archer wants to convert curiosity into deeds and decides to enter a ship floating in space.
episodes.title: Fight or Flight

episodes.synopsis: Human curiosity speaks louder than Vulcan logic. Despite T'Pol's objection, Archer sends a team to explore a planet before learning of its properties.
episodes.title: Strange New World

episodes.synopsis: After helping to repair the warp drive on board a Xyrillian ship, Trip notices a strange bulging on his arm.
episodes.title: Unexpected

episodes.synopsis: Enterprise tries to find out what happened on Terra Nova, the first colonization attempt outside Earth's solar system.
episodes.title: Terra Nova

episodes.synopsis: Archer, Trip and T'Pol are caught at a Vulcan sanctuary by Andorians. They think the sanctuary is used to spy on Andoria.
episodes.title: The Andorian Incident

episodes.synopsis: Enterprise finds a comet which contains the rare element eisilium. A Vulcan ship arrives, and Capt. Vanik tells they're interested in human behavior.
episodes.title: Breaking the Ice

episodes.synopsis: T'Pol finds unusual neutrino readings on a planet with a preindustrial society.
episodes.title: Civilization

episodes.synopsis: Enterprise is sent to help the freighter Fortunate after an attack. But its first officer, Ryan, is hiding something.
episodes.title: Fortunate Son

episodes.synopsis: A group of aliens watch a stellar phenomenon on board Enterprise. When the ship is saved from blowing up, crewman Daniels has a message for Archer.
episodes.title: Cold Front

episodes.synopsis: After an attack by a mysterious ship, Archer orders Enterprise's return to Jupiter to install phase cannons.
episodes.title: Silent Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Phlox is asked to save the Valakians from annihilation by disease. He discovers something about another humanoid race on the planet, however.
episodes.title: Dear Doctor

episodes.synopsis: Enterprise tries to rescue a Klingon ship from sinking into a gas giant.
episodes.title: Sleeping Dogs

episodes.synopsis: Archer and T'Pol are kidnapped by an anti-Vulcan militant group and the Enterprise mounts a rescue against the Vulcan's wishes.
episodes.title: Shadows of P'Jem

episodes.synopsis: Tucker and Reed return in Shuttlepod One to rendezvous with Enterprise, only to find evidence that it has been destroyed.
episodes.title: Shuttlepod One

episodes.synopsis: Enterprise is on its way to explore the giant Arachnid Nebula when it rendezvous with a Vulcan ship that has been in space for more than eight years.
episodes.title: Fusion

episodes.synopsis: Lt. Reed discovers a rogue planet, which has broken out of orbit and therefore is devoid of any light.
episodes.title: Rogue Planet

episodes.synopsis: Four greedy Ferengis have invaded Enterprise while the crew is unconscious. They have already confiscated some valuable supplies, but want more.
episodes.title: Acquisition

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise crew meets with trader D'Marr. Unfortunately, he can't provide them with valuable ores, but knows where they can be obtained.
episodes.title: Oasis

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Archer and Mayweather are investigating a strange energy reading from the other side of a moon.
episodes.title: Detained

episodes.synopsis: A group of Kreetassans are on board Enterprise for a friendly meeting. But they leave rather unexpectedly as they seem offended by something.
episodes.title: Vox Sola

episodes.synopsis: Enterprise is planning a trip to the relaxation planet Risa when it gets an urgent request from the Vulcan High Command.
episodes.title: Fallen Hero

episodes.synopsis: Enterprise is on its way to Risa when yet again another urgent matter comes up: a distress call. It comes from a small vessel.
episodes.title: Desert Crossing

episodes.synopsis: After several delays, the Enterprise crew gets some well-deserved shore leave on the famed pleasure planet Risa.
episodes.title: Two Days and Two Nights

episodes.synopsis: Enterprise finds a mining colony of the Paraagans. The crew gets an invitation for a meeting and a shuttle pod tries to break through the atmosphere.
episodes.title: Shockwave: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Archer and temporal agent Daniels are stranded in the 31st century.
episodes.title: Shockwave: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Celebrating T'Pol's one-year anniversary as a member of the Enterprise's crew, Archer and Trip have dinner with her.
episodes.title: Carbon Creek

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise stumbles into an area of space containing cloaked mines and a malfunctioning, active mine attaches itself to the ship's hull.
episodes.title: Minefield

episodes.synopsis: After the encounter with the Romulan minefield, Enterprise is severely damaged and Trip fears the worst.
episodes.title: Dead Stop

episodes.synopsis: After previously offending the Kreetassans, Enterprise attempts to make a better second impression, only to upset the alien race once again.
episodes.title: A Night in Sickbay

episodes.synopsis: Enterprise visits a colony with a deuterium trading post, but the people seem to be pretty unwilling to trade. Are they hiding something?
episodes.title: Marauders

episodes.synopsis: T'Pol asks Capt. Archer to join her on a mission to capture a Vulcan fugitive who escaped her years ago.
episodes.title: The Seventh

episodes.synopsis: Upon returning from covertly observing a pre-warp culture, Lt. Reed realizes he lost his communicator somewhere on the planet.
episodes.title: The Communicator

episodes.synopsis: T'Pol must save the ship after the crew passed out during the approach to a black hole.
episodes.title: Singularity

episodes.synopsis: After Hoshi has used the transporter to avoid running into a storm, she starts to feel really weird.
episodes.title: Vanishing Point

episodes.synopsis: While Trip is repairing a stasis pod at a Retellian cargo ship and the woman inside wakes up, the ship makes a hasty departure and Trip must escape.
episodes.title: Precious Cargo

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious wave is headed toward Enterprise. An alien shuttle warns the crew that the radiation will kill them and seeks shelter aboard ship.
episodes.title: The Catwalk

episodes.synopsis: When Trip's shuttle is attacked, he and his aggressor are forced to land on a nearby moon. The coming dawn will make the planet inhospitable.
episodes.title: Dawn

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise makes its way to a planet hosting the Interspecies Medical Exchanges convention.
episodes.title: Stigma

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Archer is asked to negotiate between the Andorians and Vulcans, who are fighting over a small planet.
episodes.title: Cease Fire

episodes.synopsis: Enterprise discovers a pod with the body of a human that seems to be wanted by both Sulibans and Tholians.
episodes.title: Future Tense

episodes.synopsis: Archer and Trip are accused of smuggling and sent to the penal colony Canamar. While Enterprise negotiates their release, a mutiny breaks out.
episodes.title: Canamar

episodes.synopsis: Enterprise is being held captive by noncorporeal beings who claim to be explorers.
episodes.title: The Crossing

episodes.synopsis: After Enterprise lends aid to a group of accused rebels, Capt. Archer faces a tribunal and charges of conspiring against the Klingon Empire.
episodes.title: Judgment

episodes.synopsis: Ensign Travis Mayweather takes leave when Enterprise rendezvous with the cargo ship Horizon, his childhood home. The family reunion is bittersweet.
episodes.title: Horizon

episodes.synopsis: At Phlox's request, Enterprise attempts to retrieve three scientists from the planet Xantoras, where all off-worlders must evacuate within three days.
episodes.title: The Breach

episodes.synopsis: Enterprise encounters a hypergiant, the first to be studied by humans. There, they contact the Vissians, a sophisticated race with three genders.
episodes.title: Cogenitor

episodes.synopsis: Borg casualties from a century earlier are reanimated by a research team. The Enterprise is ordered to intercept them before they can escape.
episodes.title: Regeneration

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Archer recounts the story of a warp engine test to T'Pol.
episodes.title: First Flight

episodes.synopsis: While surveying an uninhabited planet, Enterprise is met by a Tellarite ship. Archer is abducted by a Tellarite hoping to collect a Klingon bounty.
episodes.title: Bounty

episodes.synopsis: An unknown probe fires on Earth, cutting a swath from Florida to Venezula. Everything in the path was destroyed, resulting in 7 million human deaths.
episodes.title: The Expanse

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise has been in the Delphic Expanse for six weeks and has yet to obtain any intel about the Xindi.
episodes.title: The Xindi

episodes.synopsis: After an attack by Oosarian pirates, Enterprise follows them to a mysterious sphere.
episodes.title: Anomaly

episodes.synopsis: Archer, Reed and Sato are transformed to aliens while visiting a planet.
episodes.title: Extinction

episodes.synopsis: The crew helps an alien woman escape her life as a sex slave. Once on board, she uses her alien abilities to gather biometric data about humans.
episodes.title: Rajiin

episodes.synopsis: Enterprise answers an automated distress call from the Vulcan ship Seleya, lost in the Expanse 9 months ago.
episodes.title: Impulse

episodes.synopsis: Hoshi Sato is contacted by a 400-year-old telepathic alien exiled on a planet in the Expanse, shunned by his society because of his abilities.
episodes.title: Exile

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise crew discovers a Xindi lab that refines Kemocite, the key ingredient in the weapon that is being built to destroy Earth.
episodes.title: The Shipment

episodes.synopsis: Refusing to leave a T'Pol behind, Archer is struck by an anomaly, leaving his brain infected with parasites that prevent him from making new memories.
episodes.title: Twilight

episodes.synopsis: Enterprise investigates an unknown colony with humans who still live a Wild West life. They seem to be suppressing an alien race.
episodes.title: North Star

episodes.synopsis: Archer decides to make a fast-growing clone of Trip to help save his life, while the Enterprise is stranded in a field of nucleonic particles.
episodes.title: Similitude

episodes.synopsis: Archer and T'Pol travel back 150 years to Earth to stop three Xindi reptilians.
episodes.title: Carpenter Street

episodes.synopsis: Enterprise is taken over by religious zealots who want to use it for a war against heretics.
episodes.title: Chosen Realm

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise crew has found the location of the testing site for the Xindi weapon -- and gets some rather unexpected help.
episodes.title: Proving Ground

episodes.synopsis: Archer and Xindi Degra are in a shuttle. With Degra experiencing memory loss, Archer tells him that they escaped from a prison.
episodes.title: Stratagem

episodes.synopsis: With Reed and Hayes bickering and Trip making T'Pol jealous, the crew finds a dying alien in a pod with technology similar to the Spheres'.
episodes.title: Harbinger

episodes.synopsis: While in command of the Enterprise because the entire crew is in a coma, Dr. Phlox starts hearing some strange sounds.
episodes.title: Doctor's Orders

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Archer orders the Enterprise crew to save an insectoid Xindi hatchery.
episodes.title: Hatchery

episodes.synopsis: Archer decides he should pilot a kamikaze shuttle to destroy the Xindi weapon. Temporal agent Daniels urges him to reconsider.
episodes.title: Azati Prime

episodes.synopsis: The Xindi council has returned Archer to the Enterprise to await a hearing. But after an attack, the ship is stranded without warp drive.
episodes.title: Damage

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Archer tries to convince Degra and Arboreal Jannar that the destruction of Earth is part of the sphere builders' scheme to conquer the universe.
episodes.title: The Forgotten

episodes.synopsis: Trying to pass through a subspace corridor, Enterprise is stopped by Enterprise.
episodes.title: E2 (E Squared)

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise has arrived at the location of the Xindi Council, where Archer can make his plea in front of the five races of Xindi.
episodes.title: The Council

episodes.synopsis: While the Reptilians force Hoshi to decipher a launch code, the Primates, Arboreals and Archer think of a way to stop the Xindi weapon.
episodes.title: Countdown

episodes.synopsis: Archer gets unexpected help when he takes Degra's ship to try to prevent Earth from being destroyed. The Enterprise tries to destroy Sphere 41.
episodes.title: Zero Hour

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise seems to have traveled back in time to World War II, but it isn't the war that we recognize.
episodes.title: Storm Front: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Vosk wants to make a deal with Archer: supplies from the ship for the completion of his time machine in return for a trip to the 22nd century.
episodes.title: Storm Front: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When the crew takes time off, Archer meets an old friend; T'Pol takes Trip to Vulcan, where a surprise awaits; and Phlox learns Earth is xenophobic.
episodes.title: Home

episodes.synopsis: After a Klingon ship is attacked, the Enterprise crew learns that Dr. Soong's imprisoned and genetically enhanced humans are responsible.
episodes.title: Borderland

episodes.synopsis: The Augments are on their way to Cold Station 12, where Augment embryos are kept.
episodes.title: Cold Station 12

episodes.synopsis: The Augments have escaped yet again. While Dr. Soong wants to hide the embryos, Malik has an entirely different and far more cruel plan.
episodes.title: The Augments

episodes.synopsis: When a bombing destroys the Earth embassy on Vulcan, Syrrannites are suspected.
episodes.title: The Forge

episodes.synopsis: After crossing the desert and surviving the sand storms, T'Pol and Archer confront the Syrranites in the Forge.
episodes.title: Awakening

episodes.synopsis: While the Enterprise travels to Andoria to warn their citizens of an attack, Archer tries to bring the Kir'Shara to the High Command.
episodes.title: Kir'Shara

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Emory Erickson comes aboard supposedly to conduct tests for subquantum teleportation. He seems to have a different agenda, however.
episodes.title: Daedelus

episodes.synopsis: Noncorporeal aliens inhabit the bodies of Enterprise crew members to study how the crew reacts to a lethal virus  that has afflicted Trip and Hoshi.
episodes.title: Observer Effect

episodes.synopsis: The crew escorts Tellarite delegates to peace talks with Andorians. En route, they rescue several Andorians who insist Tellarites had attacked them.
episodes.title: Babel One

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Archer must convince the Vulcans, the Tellarites and the Andorians to unite to find the Romulan ship.
episodes.title: United

episodes.synopsis: Enterprise finds out the marauder was piloted telepathically by an Aenar, a subspecies from Andoria.
episodes.title: The Aenar

episodes.synopsis: Phlox is abducted by the Klingons and forced to research a cure for a virus that is destined to wipe out the race. Reed is ordered to betray Archer.
episodes.title: Affliction

episodes.synopsis: While Trip comes on board to reverse the malicious Klingon modifications, Phlox and Antaak find a cure for the virus that will not please Gen. K'Vagh.
episodes.title: Divergence

episodes.synopsis: The men on the Enterprise fall under the seductive powers of three Orion women. Trip is the only male member of the crew not to succumb to the women.
episodes.title: Bound

episodes.synopsis: The Mirror Universe crew is at war with rebels of the Empire when they discover the Tholians have captured a vessel from the future.
episodes.title: In a Mirror, Darkly: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After capturing a Constitution-class starship from the future, the evil Mirror Universe Capt. Archer attempts to become Emperor.
episodes.title: In a Mirror, Darkly: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Trip and T'Pol learn from a woman that they have a baby. An investigation reveals the woman was a member of the xenophobic organization Terra Prime.
episodes.title: Demons

episodes.synopsis: Paxton threatens to destroy Starfleet Headquarters unless all aliens leave Earth. Enterprise must shut down an array on Mars, but it is well-defended.
episodes.title: Terra Prime

episodes.synopsis: Commander William Riker is trying to clear his mind and relives the last mission of the first Enterprise in the holodeck.
episodes.title: These Are the Voyages...
